data.actual_result: Your username doesn't show up in suggestions, and typing your whole name + discriminator by hand won't parse it to a mention either. However, typing `<@UserID>` works fine.
data.expected_result: You should be able to mention yourself as in servers
data.short_description: Unable to mention yourself in DMs
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any DM (1v1 or group)  - Type `@` and start to type your username
